details.title: Leaflet map viewer
details.description: Map viewer using the Leaflet API

preference.name: tileLayer
preference.label: Tile Layer
preference.description: Choose between one of the available Tile Layers 'CartoDB_Voyager', 'CartoDB_Positron', 'OSM_Mapnik', 'OSM_DE'.

preference.name: initialCenter
preference.label: Initial Location
preference.description: Decimal coordinates where map will be centered on load (e.g. `52, 5`). Leave this setting empty and and the map will automatically pan to the present coordinates.

preference.name: initialZoom
preference.label: Initial Zoom Level
preference.description: Initial zoom level. From 1 to 18, where '1' represents the furthest level and '18' the maximum zoom level.

preference.name: iconName
preference.label: Marker Icon
preference.description: Name of the icon. Leaflet.awesome-markers Plugin (e.g. L.AwesomeMarkers.icon({icon: 'coffee', markerColor: 'red'}) )

preference.name: markerColor
preference.label: Marker Color
preference.description: Color of the marker. Leaflet.awesome-markers Plugin (e.g. L.AwesomeMarkers.icon({icon: 'coffee', markerColor: 'red'}) )

preference.name: useMulticolorPolyline
preference.label: Use Multicolor for Polyline
preference.description: Mark this option to set each polyline in a different color.

preference.name: useHyphensPolyline
preference.label: Use Hyphens for Polyline
preference.description: Mark this option for displaying polylines with hyphens..

preference.name: polylineWeight
preference.label: Weight for Polyline
preference.description: Specify the weight with which polyline is to be displayed.

preference.name: useTooltip
preference.label: Use Tooltip
preference.description: Mark this option to use tooltip instead of popup

preference.name: useClustering
preference.label: Use Clustering
preference.description: Mark this option to use clustering for displaying map features

preference.name: useDrawingPath
preference.label: Use Drawing Path Animation
preference.description: Mark this option to activate an automatic drawing of the paths (polyline).

preference.name: useMovingMarker
preference.label: Use Moving Mark Animation
preference.description: Mark this option to enable automatic movement of a marker on a path (polyline).

preference.name: useSnakeAnimation
preference.label: Use Snake Animation
preference.description: Mark this option to make polylines animate into existence.

preference.name: startPointMarkerLine
preference.label: Startpoint Marker Snake Animation
preference.description: Identical to the previous field 'Marker icon', except that here a marker can be defined for the startpoint of a line. For example, the startpoint of a line can be set with a marker like a car-icon and the destination with a marker like a home-icon. If the field remains the same, no marker is set.

preference.name: endPointMarkerLine
preference.label: Endpoint Marker Snake Animation
preference.description: Identical to the previous field 'Marker icon', except that here a marker can be defined for the endpoint of a line. For example, the endpoint of a line can be set with a marker like a car-icon and the destination with a marker like a home-icon. If the field remains the same, no marker is set.

inputendpoint.name: poiInput
inputendpoint.label: Insert/Update PoI
inputendpoint.description: Insert or update a Point of Interest.

inputendpoint.name: replacePoIs
inputendpoint.label: Replace PoIs
inputendpoint.description: Replace all the rendered PoIs by the ones provided in the event.

inputendpoint.name: deletePoiInput
inputendpoint.label: Delete PoI
inputendpoint.description: Removes one or more point of interests from the map.

inputendpoint.name: heatmap
inputendpoint.label: Add heatmap layer
inputendpoint.description: Add a heatmap layer to the map

outputendpoint.name: poiOutput
outputendpoint.label: PoI selected
outputendpoint.description: A PoI has been selected on the map
